Guo Hao TeoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 28 Feb 2019Depends on what the merger was for and about strategy of the entire business or group holding company if this was planned ahead. Ultimately stock price is determined based on market sentiment and it comes from the above.0 comments0
